item.title: .NET Core 3: 'Bad IL format'
item.description: We have recently been migrating our compliance platform from .NET 4.7 to .NET Core 3. The existing code uses Autofac to manage inversion of control and we wanted to stick with it for now, instead of using the built-in DI middleware that comes packaged with .NET Core 3.
